actor_eventA_leader1_01

actor_eventA_leader1_ex2
\nc<>Ah, Kei-san. This way, please. Please have a seat here.
\nc<>Welcome.

\nc<>I was worried that it would end with a misunderstanding, but
thank you for giving me the opportunity to explain.
\nc<>Because I promised.
actor_eventA_leader1_02
\nc<>By the way, what is this smell?

\nc<>It's an aroma made from chestnut flowers. We use it to
assist women in meditation at the Paradise School.
\nc<>Could it be that you don't like it?
actor_eventA_leader1_03

\nc<>Ah, no. It's not like that. I just asked because it was a
strange smell.

\nc<>Most women don't dislike the scent of chestnut flowers.
There are some who dislike it based on their experience, but
that's about it.

\nc<>The leader secretly smiled as they saw Kei, who did not show
any signs of refusal.
\nc<>(It's tough for me, but I'll accept it.)

\nc<>(Since we've caught such a splendid beckoning cat in our
net.)
\nc<>The leader looked at Kei as if licking them all over.

\nc<>The silhouette of the pelvis can be seen even from the top
of the skirt, the chest that asserts itself through the
shirt, and even the well-proportioned facial features.

\nc<>A female that any man would want to violate was glaring at
him.
\nc<>Their sharp gaze will soon submit and become calm.
\nc<>The leader couldn't wait for that moment to come.
actor_eventA_leader1_04
\nc<>...The leader?

\nc<>Oops, my apologies. Let's talk about something else for a
moment.
\nc<>Well then, let's try experiencing meditation right away.
actor_eventA_leader1_05

\nc<>Despite the provocative beckoning, the leader took out a
crystal the size of a fist.

\nc<>The crystal was a magical tool that contained his power as a
villain.

\nc<>If a person has weak resistance, just looking at it can
hypnotize them, and even normal people will show some
reaction.
\nc<>However, Kei only tilted their head with a calm expression.

\nc<>(Hmm... It seems their resistance to magic power is
abnormally high.)

\nc<>The cult leader sighed in their heart. However, it's not
impossible, just difficult.

\nc<>In the end, if you spend enough time, the barrier will
crumble. This type of thing, once it crumbles, becomes
easier to tame.

\nc<>You may already know this, but I'll say it first. Our
Paradise Cult uses hypnosis when entering meditation.
actor_eventA_leader1_06
\nc<>Hypnosis... you say?

\nc<>It may seem suspicious.
However, hypnosis is not a
supernatural phenomenon but a scientific theory.
\nc<>We are providing inner peace to our followers through this.
\nc<>Yes...

\nc<>Kei had a gloomy expression.
However, it was also
something they intended.

\nc<>The biggest enemy in hypnosis is being ridiculed with
There's no such thing.

\nc<>On the flip side, if you have the recognition that such
things are possible, then the trigger doesn't matter.

\nc<>When you doubt it as a supernatural phenomenon, it means you
believe it is possible.

\nc<>Now, first lean back on the chair. Relax without worrying
about your posture.
actor_eventA_leader1_07
\nc<>Are we going to do it here?

\nc<>Yes, I did mention it.
Our goal is to bring inner peace
to our followers.

\nc<>We do not engage in painful acts. Because when the body is
at ease, the mind also becomes at ease.

\nc<>This place is also a personal meditation room that followers
can use anytime.

\nc<>Kei, who had imagined a vague scene like a church or temple,
found the words of the religious leader somewhat refreshing.
actor_eventA_leader1_08

\nc<>Therefore, Kei obediently followed the words of the
religious leader and leaned back on the chair in a
comfortable posture.
\nc<>Next, please look at this crystal in that state.

\nc<>There is no need to concentrate. Just relax and gaze
leisurely, as if you were looking at the scenery outside the
train.
actor_eventA_leader1_09

\nc<>Kei's eyes unconsciously followed the faint purple light
swaying inside the crystal ball.
\nc<>Now, next is deep breathing. Take a deep breath in...
\nc<>*sigh*
\nc<>They're vomiting...
\nc<>*sigh*
\nc<>One more time, inhale... exhale...
\nc<>Alright. Keep it up.

\nc<>A simple instruction that anyone can do, which is to take a
breath.

\nc<>However, in order to synchronize the timing, you have to be
somewhat conscious of the other person's words.
actor_eventA_leader1_10

\nc<>Kei's consciousness had unknowingly focused on the
instructions of the cult leader while repeating deep
breaths.

\nc<>At the same time, deep breathing relaxes the tension in the
body. Unconsciously, strength gradually left Kei's body,
which had been stiffened.

\nc<>The tightly closed lips slightly parted, and the legs that
were tightly closed relaxed.

\nc<>After confirming their carelessness, the cult leader moved
on to the next stage.
\nc<>Next is the left hand.

\nc<>As they continue to breathe slowly, their left hand
gradually... loses strength.

\nc<>One by one, from the fingertips to the palm of the hand.
And then, up to the wrist.
\nc<>Inhale, exhale...

\nc<>The cult leader slowly assimilated Kei's deep breaths with
their instructions.

\nc<>While sucking, continue speaking and stop speaking the
moment the breath stops.

\nc<>They are taught to repeat this and synchronize their
breathing with the timing.
\nc<>Alright. Keep it up. Shall we move on to the right hand?

\nc<>Since I've done it once, it should go even better this
time.

\nc<>Now, the power that can be felt from the entire hand...
gradually fades away.

\nc<>When they exhale in sync with their breath, their strength
gradually drains away.
\nc<>Repetition dulls a person's thinking.

\nc<>It becomes so confusing that they don't even know whether to
synchronize their breathing with the instructions or to
follow the instructions based on their breathing.

\nc<>If you go further from there, it becomes impossible to
distinguish between the two.

\nc<>Following the cult leader's instructions, they start to
inhale and exhale.
\nc<>Taking a deep breath is a surprisingly powerful action.

\nc<>Holding your breath or exhaling completely is never a
comfortable state for a person.

\nc<>Kei became unable to escape from the cult leader's
instructions, in order to find a breath that would release
them from that suffering.

\nc<>Both the left hand and the right hand have lost all their
strength. However, the weight remains the same.
\nc<>The arms gradually feel heavier as the strength drains away.

\nc<>When Kei noticed the contradiction in the middle, they
stopped breathing along with him.

\nc<>The obedience that they themselves were probably not even
aware of. Upon confirming that, the cult leader continued
the suggestion with a satisfied expression.

\nc<>It's okay. You'll feel better soon.
Take a breath and
exhale.

\nc<>Every time they repeat this, their arms become a little
lighter. They continue to become lighter and lighter.

\nc<>The weight becomes imperceptible and gradually lifts. It
feels light and airy.
actor_eventA_leader1_11

\nc<>Kei's arms began to float every time the cult leader's
instructions continued.
\nc<>Little by little, but surely.
\nc<>At the moment it floated up to the chest area,
actor_eventA_leader1_12
\nc<>Stop.

\nc<>Kei's arms came to a sudden stop in mid-air at the firm
instruction.

\nc<>How is it? Have you understood what it feels like even a
little bit?
\nc<>...Ah, ah...yes.

\nc<>The cult leader's tone of voice is changing. It's not an
instruction, but a conversation.
\nc<>Kei unconsciously understood that and answered a beat late.
\nc<>They were also genuinely surprised.

\nc<>Kei widened their eyes and looked at their own arms in
disbelief.

\nc<>It's strange. Even though I feel like I could move if I
tried... It's more like I don't want to move...

\nc<>Now that the hypnosis has been lifted, you can move if you
want.
Go ahead, like this.
actor_eventA_leader1_13
\nc<>Ah,

\nc<>Kei's arm returned to its original position when the cult
leader pushed their arm.
\nc<>In any case, strong hypnosis is impossible at this stage.

\nc<>If it's going to be solved anyway, it's quicker to implant
the recognition of I solved it for you rather than you
solved it.

\nc<>I think you understand since you have actually experienced
it, but hypnosis is not a brainwashing technique to
manipulate others as you please.
\nc<>Did you feel any parts that felt forced?
actor_eventA_leader1_14
\nc<>No. If I wanted to stop, I could have stopped at any time.
\nc<>Actually, I secretly tried moving my hand in the middle.
\nc<>Is that so?

\nc<>Hypnosis cannot make someone do actions they do not want to
do. Of course, I have no intention of making them do so.
\nc<>The words of the cult leader were not a lie.

\nc<>From a scientific perspective, at least, the technique of
hypnosis does not achieve magical effects.

\nc<>Of course, the cult leader had no intention of using only
techniques.
\nc<>Well, meditation is not over yet.

\nc<>Please calm down, clear your mind, and focus on the crystal
in front of you.
\nc<>Yes...
\nc<>Bo-wan---.
\nc<>The small swaying crystal.

\nc<>If you're human, or even someone who can manipulate magic,
the faint waves of power that cannot be seen spread around
you.

\nc<>Of course, it is so weak that it does not have any effect
unless you stare at it directly.

\nc<>Kei already has the understanding that during meditation,
they should look at the crystal.

\nc<>Through Kei's gaze, who was staring absentmindedly at the
crystal, the power of the cult leader slowly, ever so
slowly, began to taint their body.
